item.title: By: HAY GUYS
item.dc:creator: HAY GUYS
item.description:
"Various evil replies sprang to mind: 'I disenchanted it', 'I gave it to a noob pally in Goldshire', 'I had to sell privately for 100 gold to a hunter', and the classic: 'fuck off.'
That was funny.
item.content:encoded:
“Various evil replies sprang to mind: ‘I disenchanted it’, ‘I gave it to a noob pally in Goldshire’, ‘I had to sell privately for 100 gold to a hunter’, and the classic: ‘fuck off.’

That was funny.

item.title: By: HAY GUYS

I wish you'd write about gay anal sex!
item.content:encoded:

item.title: By: HAY GUYS
item.dc:creator: HAY GUYS
item.description:
"It's kind of my specialty, loot whore that I am."
This made me giggle like a little girl.
item.content:encoded:
“It’s kind of my specialty, loot whore that I am.”

This made me giggle like a little girl.

item.title: By: jafd
item.dc:creator: jafd
item.description:
"particularly when I skewer them mercilessly."
You're giving yourself way, way too much credit.
item.content:encoded:
“particularly when I skewer them mercilessly.”

You’re giving yourself way, way too much credit.

item.title: By: Foton of AFKGamer
item.dc:creator: Foton of AFKGamer
item.description:
Well. I assigned this ethical discussion to my imaginary intern. And I think we all know how interns are, especially the imaginary variety. So it may never get written.
Suffice to say, much as I enjoy a cloak of anonymity, (as most of us in gaming do), I think my subjects should enjoy the same privacy, particularly when I skewer them mercilessly.
item.content:encoded:
Well. I assigned this ethical discussion to my imaginary intern. And I think we all know how interns are, especially the imaginary variety. So it may never get written.

Suffice to say, much as I enjoy a cloak of anonymity, (as most of us in gaming do), I think my subjects should enjoy the same privacy, particularly when I skewer them mercilessly.

item.title: By: jafd
item.dc:creator: jafd
item.description:
"Tomorrow, I'll make a mini-post in response"
Or, you could just link the item. That'd be easiest for me -- I really don't give a shit, I'm just curious -- but if you want to make mini-posts, hey, be my guest.
item.content:encoded:
“Tomorrow, I’ll make a mini-post in response”

Or, you could just link the item. That’d be easiest for me — I really don’t give a shit, I’m just curious — but if you want to make mini-posts, hey, be my guest.

item.title: By: nexis
item.dc:creator: nexis
item.description:
I'd say it's likely this one as it's the only high lvl non-bind on pickup that a rogue couldn't use with a proc that could be described as vicious. http://thottbot.com/index.cgi?i=14001
It's listed as only dropping in an instance but the comments show otherwise.
item.content:encoded:
I’d say it’s likely this one as it’s the only high lvl non-bind on pickup that a rogue couldn’t use with a proc that could be described as vicious. http://thottbot.com/index.cgi?i=14001

It’s listed as only dropping in an instance but the comments show otherwise.

item.title: By: Foton of AFKGamer
item.dc:creator: Foton of AFKGamer
item.description:
jafd, you raise some interesting points. Other than the I'm full of myself, which I am ... quite often. So I'll concede that point up front.
As the login servers are down AT THE MOMENT, just when I was swapping back to the main character, I read your provocative comment, and I'd like to respond. Tomorrow, I'll make a mini-post in response as some of the issues you raise require more space than a flippant response.
item.content:encoded:
jafd, you raise some interesting points. Other than the I’m full of myself, which I am … quite often. So I’ll concede that point up front.

As the login servers are down AT THE MOMENT, just when I was swapping back to the main character, I read your provocative comment, and I’d like to respond. Tomorrow, I’ll make a mini-post in response as some of the issues you raise require more space than a flippant response.
